name: PILOT TRAVEL CENTERS LLC
sampleDescriptions: H.R.1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 (P.L.115-123), H.R.1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018 (P.L.115-141); issues related to tax extenders.
